sentence: Tuesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 3,613.59.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 1.27 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 2.69 to 1 ratio.
There were 1842 advancers and 685 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 25 stocks reached a 52 week high and 18 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .4% for the day; a total of 12.41 points.
Apple Inc. ( AAPL ) had the largest percent change down (-1.31%) while Netflix, Inc. ( NFLX ) had the largest percent change gain rising 5.2%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.05% for the day; a total of -7.75 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-1.22%) while Intel Corporation ( INTC ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.09%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
